message: Ideally I would just 'tag' the tweets and they show up in a box on the blog sidebar.
PS Yeah I have a big head. :)
I'd like to collect tweets that talk about how swell I am and post them on my blog. Is there a tool that will do this already?
I built an endpoint that connects to twitter's streaming api, then submits events back to a kynetx app for processing.
The code is not productionized, but I'd by happy to share. It's a node.js app.
Not quite what I'm looking for. This would be more of a 'click to post to your blog' functionality.
